text.front:
IN THE HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM
PRESENT
THE HONOURABLE MR. JUSTICE RAJA VIJAYARAGHAVAN V
TUESDAY, THE 12TH DAY OF JANUARY 2021 / 22TH POUSHA, 1942
WP(C).No.27357 OF 2020(T)
PETITIONER:
M/S HOTEL BLUE BELLS,
ANGAMALY, ERNAKULAM DISTRICT, REPRESENTED BY ITS
MANAGING PARTNER, PAUL DAVIS, AGED 30 YEARS,
S/O. E.J.DAVIS.
BY ADVS.
SRI.M.G.KARTHIKEYAN
SRI.NIREESH MATHEW
RESPONDENTS:
1
THE EXCISE COMMISSIONER
COMMISSIONERATE OF EXCISE,
THIRUVANANTHAPURAM -695033.
2
THE DEPUTY COMMISSIONER OF EXCISE,
ERNAKULAM -682018.
3
THE CIRCLE INSPECTOR OF EXCISE,
ALUVA -683102, ERNAKULAM DISTRICT.
4
THE EXCISE INSPECTOR
EXCISE RANGE OFFICE, ANGAMALY -683573,
ERNAKULAM DISTRICT.
SMT.MABLE.C.KURIAN, GP
THIS WRIT PETITION (CIVIL) HAVING BEEN FINALLY HEARD ON
12.01.2021, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY DELIVERED THE FOLLOWING:
text.body:
JUDGMENT
The petitioner states that the 1st respondent has passed an
order and it is submitted that the said order is being challenged in
independent proceedings. He seeks permission to withdraw this
petition with liberty to exhaust his legal remedies. Reserving such
right, this writ petition is dismissed as withdrawn.
Sd/-
RAJA VIJAYARAGHAVAN V
sru
JUDGE
